name: Episcopal Community Services
description: Episcopal Community Services (ECS) provides services to un-housed or at-risk seniors to obtain the housing, jobs, shelter, and essential services each person needs to prevent and end homelessness. Call 311 to make a reservation for a 90-day shelter bed. If you have been assessed by Coordinated Entry for Housing and have questions about your status, contact Coordinated Entry at (415) 487-3300 ext. 7000 or email sfaces@ecs-sf.org.
